Opgave 2.10
```{r}
library(readr)
neuron <- read_csv("data/data/neuron.txt", 
    col_names = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(infer)


hmm <- neuron |>
  specify(response = X1)|>
  generate(reps = 1000, type  = "bootstrap")
 
hmm|>
  group_by(replicate)|>
  summarise(parameter = sd(x)/mean(x)-1)  




cvme <- neuron |>
  specify(response = X1)|>
  generate(reps = 1000, type  = "bootstrap")
 
cvme|>
  group_by(replicate)|>
  summarise(parameter = sd(x)/mean(x)-1)

```
